content: *a little gift to say thank you for your patience the last few weeks and for your ongoing support and you can practice the dip stitch pattern for my french kiss collection the first one was the french kiss top 1 and i m so in love with this stitch pattern there is more to come * the french kiss hat is worked in the round seamlessly from the bottom up first you work the brim in 1x1 rib then you work the body in dip st pattern the crown is then shaped by decreases details **sizes** 1 2 to fit head circumference of 53-58 59-64 cm 20¾-22¾ 23¼-25¼ sample shown in size 1 on a 55cm 21¾ head circumference **suggested yarn** mc 1 skein of lana grossa ecopuno 72% cotton 17% wool 11% alpaca 215m 235yds /50g color 56 ecru cc 1 skein of camarose midnatssol 54% alpaca 36% tencel 10% wool 200m 235yds /25g color 9588 lys avocado **gauge** 28 st x 40 rnds = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 in 1x1 rib pattern on smaller needle size after blocking or 24 sts x 40 rnds in dip stitch pattern on main needle **suggested needles** main needle 3 25 - 3 5mm us3-4 depending on your gauge 40 cm 16 circulars and dpns for the crown or longer circular needles for magic loop smaller needle 3 - 3 25mm us3-4 40 cm 16 circulars **materials** 5 stitch markers spare needle 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/french-kiss-top
